CutSceneText.Text: In the Arena of Chaos, six to ten Daevas engage in all-out combat.
Remember, you can rely on nobody, not even your fellow Asmodians.
The first to reach a target number of points wins.
There will be 3 rounds, and you won't suffer from Soul Sickness if you die.
Even if nobody scores enough points to win outright, all contestants are ranked after 3 rounds.
Good luck, Daeva! You'll need it.
